attributes.action: intervene in the case of the recently refused Visa Application request to visit the United Kingdom, by the U.S. Citizen and International Businesswoman Martha Stewart.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that she poses absolutely no threat to the UK nor it's citizens, has served her penalty for past errors of judgement, is a major creator of employment plus economic asset, in her Country, and has come to offer trade to our own industries, we respectfully ask that the UK Border Agency be instructed to make an exception and consider her offences as spent, with entry granted.
